        Parameters:
        task - Zeidon task
        attributeInstance - If not null, the is the target attribute. May be null; this can happen when converting a value to be used in generated SQL.

      • generateRandomTestValue

        public Object generateRandomTestValue(Task task,
                                      AttributeDef attributeDef,
                                      EntityInstance entityInstance)
        Generate a RANDOM test value for this domain. This is used by test code to create RANDOM test data.
        Specified by:
        generateRandomTestValue in interface Domain
        Overrides:
        generateRandomTestValue in class StringDomain
        Parameters:
        task - current task
        attributeDef - def of the attribute.
        entityInstance - if not null this is the EntityInstance that will store the test data.

        RANDOM test data for this domain.
